div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1294 Maeander Valley, Caria or Ionia, (637) 1895 Burial: c. 300-250 B.C. Contents: 13 AV Philip II: post. st. (Amphipolis 1, Abydus 2, Clazomenae 1, Magnesia 1, Teos 1, Mylasa 1, unc. mints 6) Disposition: London Price, NC 1969, pp. 9-10
